scope.title: Text
scope.description: Text is the used to render text and paragraphs within an interface.

frontMatter.excerpt: Text component is the used to render text and paragraphs within an interface.
frontMatter.mdxContent:
--- title: Text package: "@chakra-ui/layout" description: Text is the used to render text and paragraphs within an interface. --- `Text` component is the used to render text and paragraphs within an interface. It renders a `

` tag by default. ## Import ```js import { Text } from "@chakra-ui/react" ``` ## Changing the font size To increase the font size of the text, you can pass the `fontSize` prop. ```jsx (6xl) In love with React & Next (5xl) In love with React & Next (4xl) In love with React & Next (3xl) In love with React & Next (2xl) In love with React & Next (xl) In love with React & Next (lg) In love with React & Next (md) In love with React & Next (sm) In love with React & Next (xs) In love with React & Next ``` ```tsx (6xl) In love with React & Next (5xl) In love with React & Next (4xl) In love with React & Next (3xl) In love with React & Next (2xl) In love with React & Next (xl) In love with React & Next (lg) In love with React & Next (md) In love with React & Next (sm) In love with React & Next (xs) In love with React & Next ``` ### Truncate text Pass the `isTruncated` prop to render an ellipsis when the text exceeds the width of the viewport or `maxWidth` prop. ```jsx Lorem ipsum is placeholder text commonly used in the graphic, print, and publishing industries for previewing layouts and visual mockups. ``` ```tsx Lorem ipsum is placeholder text commonly used in the graphic, print, and publishing industries for previewing layouts and visual mockups. ``` Likewise, if you'd like to truncate the text after a specific number of lines, pass the `noOfLines` prop and set it to the desired no of lines. > Pro Tip ðŸ’¡: You can also apply `noOfLines` responsively. ```jsx live=false // Basic version "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog" is an English-language pangramâ€”a sentence that contains all of the letters of the English alphabet. Owing to its existence, Chakra was created. // Responsive version "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog" is an English-language pangramâ€”a sentence that contains all of the letters of the English alphabet. Owing to its existence, Chakra was created. ``` ```tsx live=false // Basic version "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog" is an English-language pangramâ€”a sentence that contains all of the letters of the English alphabet. Owing to its existence, Chakra was created. // Responsive version "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog" is an English-language pangramâ€”a sentence that contains all of the letters of the English alphabet. Owing to its existence, Chakra was created. ``` ### Override style You can change the entire style of the text via props. For example, to change the font size, pass the `fontSize` prop. No need to write `css` or `styled()`. ```jsx I'm using a custom font-size value for this text ``` ```tsx I'm using a custom font-size value for this text ``` ### Override the element To override the element that gets rendered, pass the `as` prop. Use **Inspect Element** to see the element that gets rendered in html. ```jsx <> Italic
Underline

sup ``` ```tsx <> Italic

sup ``` ## Props `Text` composes the [Box](/docs/layout/box) component, so you can pass all `Box` style props.

frontMatter.description: Text is the used to render text and paragraphs within an interface.
